title: Federal judge blocks Trump from cutting school funding over DEI
shortDescription: A federal judge in New Hampshire has blocked the Trump administration from cutting federal funding from public schools that continue to run diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) programs.

title: Trump open to returning Abrego Garcia: 5 takeaways from TIME interview
shortDescription: Trump discussed Kilmar Abrego Garcia's case, tariffs, Greenland and sending American criminals to foreign prisons in '100 days' interview with Time magazine.

title: Congress won't back Greenland invasion, top Dem says
shortDescription: "I don't believe that there is real bipartisan support...to aggressively move on Greenland," House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries said in Denmark.

title: Trump administration reverses termination of student visas
shortDescription: The Trump administration restored visa registrations for foreign students after setting off a desperate scramble by abruptly terminating them.

title: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker endorses Juliana Stratton for U.S. Senate
shortDescription: Illinois Democratic Gov. JB Pritzker announced on Friday he is endorsing his Lt. Gov. Juliana Stratton for U.S. Senate.

title: Term-limited Trump hosts $1M-per-plate campaign fundraiser
shortDescription: Since his January inauguration, Trump has hosted at least three such big-dollars dinners at his Mar-a-Lago estate to raise funds for the super PAC.

title: President Trump's first 100 days approval rating
shortDescription: President Trump marks 100 days in office next week and new polling shows how voters really feel about the administration's performance.

title: Trump's envoy Witkoff meets Putin in Moscow
shortDescription: Trump's envoy Steve Witkoff met President Vladimir Putin in Moscow in what Trump has called a key moment in diplomacy to end the war in Ukraine.

title: Joe Biden to attend Pope Francis' funeral in Rome
shortDescription: Former President Joe Biden and first lady Jill Biden will among those attending Saturday's funeral for Pope Francis in Vatican City.

title: Pope Francis funeral: Trump, Zelenskyy among leaders attending
shortDescription: Pope Francis' funeral this weekend will see global leaders including President Donald Trump and Prince William.

title: DOJ memo offers glimpse inside Trump’s Venezuelan gang roundup
shortDescription: Trump administration officials directed police to circumvent courts and pursue gang members into their homes without a warrant, a new document shows.

title: Trump's first 100 days bring 100 things that have changed (so far)
shortDescription: Not since Franklin Roosevelt has a new president driven so many shifts, so fast. Here's 100 things that have already changed under Donald Trump.

title: Trump Organization sells 'Trump 2028' hats
shortDescription: The Trump Organization is selling "Trump 2028" hats as the president keeps pushing the idea of running for an unconstitutional third term.

title: What we know now about Trump's impact on education
shortDescription: Education, especially higher education, has been a major focus of President Trump's term. Here is what we know now about his changes to education.

title: NEH hiring Trump’s ‘Garden of Heroes’ artists after cancelling grants
shortDescription: National Endowment for the Humanities union says Trump is using the agency "as a propaganda pipeline."

title: From Trump to Reagan: Their first 100 days
shortDescription: As the Trump administration is set to cross the 100-day mark, here's a look at how we came to judge new presidents.

title: Fort McCoy commander disciplined after missing Trump, Hegseth portraits
shortDescription: The leader of Fort McCoy base in Wisconsin was suspended after backlash for not displaying portraits of President Trump and Defense Secretary Hegseth.

title: Trump order puts civil rights protections at risk, activists say
shortDescription: The landmark 1964 Civil Rights Act aimed to prevent workplace discrimination. Trump says it promotes bias and will stop enforcing it.
